####[Null Signal](https://nullsignal.games) [Uprising Release Notes](https://nullsignal.games/files/Uprising_Release_Notes.pdf) [Null Signal Rules Team]
Can the Corp play Digital Rights Management on the first turn of the game?
>No. The "Play only ifâ€¦" restriction is not satisfied, because there is no "Runner's last turn" to check as to whether there were any successful runs on HQ.
